conbody.p: The type of orbs applicable to an item is determined by its rarity.
Rare items have the largest orb pool. Normal, Magic or Unique items can have only a few orb types applied to them.
Every type of orb has a different effect - affixes' values change, affixes reroll, removal of affixes, item rarity change, etc.

How to discover an orb function: Hovering over an orb opens a window with information about its effect and the rarity type it may be used on. If no rarity type is mentioned, the orb may be applied to an item of any type.
